Package possportstore

Class Shoe

java.lang.Object
possportstore.Product
possportstore.Shoe
public class Shoe extends Product
Represents a shoe product within the inventory. Extends the Product class with specific attributes like size, color, and shoe type.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes

    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Shoe.TypeShoe
    Enumeration defining the specific categories of shoes available.

      public Shoe()

    • Shoe

      public Shoe(String idProduct, String name, double price, int stock, String description, String size, String color, Shoe.TypeShoe type)
      Constructs a new Shoe product with all details.
      Parameters:
      idProduct - The unique identifier.
      name - The product name.
      price - The unit price.
      stock - The initial stock quantity.
      description - The product description.
      size - The shoe size (e.g., "42", "9.5 US").
      color - The primary color of the shoe.
      type - The category of the shoe (from Shoe.TypeShoe).
